articles.author: Eric Revell
articles.title: Apple, Google, Meta targeted in EU's first Digital Markets Act investigations - Fox Business
articles.description: The Big Tech trio of Apple, Google and Meta is facing an investigation from European Union antitrust regulators under newly implemented provisions of the Digital Markets Act.
articles.content:
Tech giants Apple, Google and Meta will be investigated by European Union antitrust regulators
 for potential violations of the EU's landmark law to promote competition in the digital economy that c… [+4943 chars]
